title: RuntimeError: the derivative for 'target' is not implemented. When I use F.smooth_l1_loss(x, y, reduce=False)
body_html:
When I calculate the smooth L1 Loss between two Variable with F.smooth_l1_loss(x, y, reduce=False), I will the get this:

However, when switching to nn.SmoothL1Loss(x, y, reduce=False), I have no problem. It's weird man

body:
When I calculate the smooth L1 Loss between two Variable with F.smooth_l1_loss(x, y, reduce=False), I will the get this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18025870/33373645-d3a112d6-d53d-11e7-8111-e224c6843caa.png)
However, when switching to nn.SmoothL1Loss(x, y, reduce=False), I have no problem. It's weird man
